title: Molecule formula set - only one double bond

content.description:
Directions: Each set of lettered choices below refers to the numbered statements immediately following it. Select the one lettered choice that best fits each statement. A choice may be used once, more than once, or not at all in each set.

The following questions refer to the below molecules:
(A) CO2

(B) H2O

(C) CH4

(D) C2H4

(E) PH3
content.question: The molecule with only one double bond

skill.text: 1.A: Describe the components of and quantitative information from models and representations that illustrate particulate-level properties only.
